text: Sacred Heart University is a private, Roman Catholic university in Fairfield, Connecticut. The university has about 6,023 students. It was founded in 1963. The current president of the university is John J. Petillo. ==Sports== The athletics teams of the university are called the Pioneers. They have 31 varsity teams, most of which compete in the Northeast Conference. The men's ice hockey team competes in Atlantic Hockey. ==Other websites== *Sacred Heart University's Official website *Sacred Heart Pioneers' Official athletics website Category:Northeast Conference Category:Atlantic Hockey Category:Colleges and universities in Connecticut Category:1963 establishments in the United States Category:20th-century establishments in Connecticut Category:Fairfield, Connecticut Category:Census-designated places in Fairfield County, Connecticut
title: Sacred Heart University
